titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Ray Markey Files on the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1930 WAG.286
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Maggie Schreiner

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-02-18T14:29-0500

did.unittitle: Ray Markey Files on the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1930

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains material pertaining to the history of the New York Public Library Guild Local 1930, AFSCME.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist; materials are in the order in which they were received from the donor.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Donated by Ray Markey in 2008. The accession number 2008.028 is associated with this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Ray Markey are held by Ray Markey. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Ray Markey.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials
relatedmaterial.p: American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1930 Records (WAG 040)
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1930 Photographs (PHOTOS 017)

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Ray Markey Files on the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1930; WAG 286; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Raymond (Ray) Markey was the president of the New York Public Library Guild Local 1930, AFSCME from 1992 to 2004.
